Issue.creator: kchristidis
Issue.summary: As a Fabric user, I need documentation to walk me through setting up the etcd/raft-based ordering service
Issue.description: This will be the "Configuring Raft" doc, the partner to the "Bringing up a Kafka-based ordering service": https://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/release-1.4/kafka.html
